changeSet.createView: SELECT r.id, r.name, r.description, r.notes, up.name AS updated_by, w.name AS workspace, wa.key AS wsp_key, wa.description AS wsp_desc, r.version FROM existential r JOIN existential up ON r.updated_by = up.id LEFT JOIN workspace_label wa ON wa.reference = r.id LEFT JOIN existential w ON wa.workspace = w.id WHERE r.domain = 'Agency'
